title: Judge halts Trump administration from detaining immigrant children after they turn 18
summary: A ruling has temporarily halted the transfer of individuals to adult detention centers that advocates claimed was scheduled for this weekend. This decision comes amid concerns from advocates regarding the potential impact on those affected. The situation remains under scrutiny as legal proceedings continue.

title: Maresca’s wild sprint a red-hot release after Chelsea stifle misfiring Liverpool | Barney Ronay
summary: The Blues’ head coach was dismissed during the match following Estêvão Willian’s dramatic injury-time winning goal. Despite this setback, it is Arne Slot who must strategize moving forward. The situation presents challenges for the team as they navigate their next steps.
